title: Offerings, Sabbath Breaker, and Tassels
summary: Numbers 15 gives laws about offerings and unintentional sins. It also records the punishment of a man who violated the Sabbath. God commands the Israelites to wear tassels as a reminder to obey His laws.

faq.question: What happened to the man who broke the Sabbath?
faq.answer: He was stoned to death, showing the seriousness of disobedience.

faq.question: What was the purpose of the tassels?
